Task Instructions

In this job, you will be presented with reddit comments about COVID-19 in Netherlands. Please review the comments to determine the overall sentiment of the author.

The comments can be classified as positive, neutral, or negative:

  • Positive means some aspects of the comment uncover a positive mood, such as praise, recommendations or a favorable comparison.
  • Neutral means that the comment is only informative in nature and provides no hint as to the mood of the author.
  • Negative means some aspects of the comment uncover a negative mood such as, criticism, insults or a negative comparison.

Steps

  • 1) First, read the comment.
  • 2) Then, determine if the comment is positive, neutral, or negative.

Examples

Positive (In this example, the author shows a positive mood):

At this stage, i'll be happy to get the summer, never mind kingsday

Neutral (In this example, the post is purely informative and offers no indication as to the mood of the author):

You are helping doctors and nurses by staying home if you have a non-essential job. It's the best way reduce the rate at which the virus spreads.

Negative (The majority of this comment is negative, while only dedicating a small portion to the positive parts):

I was cycling through the park on Tuesday and saw runners around in groups...I understand going out and getting some air, but I definitely saw a lack of distance & precaution...really strange.
